main event: A civilian reported observing a long and narrow object with a white outline and two flashing lights in Wheatridge, Colorado on February 27, 1967.
interesting points: The object was observed for 4-5 minutes in a straight easterly direction., The object had a long row of windows appearing longer than those on commercial jet airliners but without wings., The object emitted no sound and left no trail., The visual evidence indicated the object could not be conclusively identified as an aircraft., The conclusion drawn was that the object was likely an aircraft, although this couldn't be confirmed.
sighted object: a long and narrow object with a white outline and flashing lights
